name: Bone Pickaxe
description: After Hunt phase setup, place the Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Bone Darts
description: Range: 6. Frail: When you attempt tp wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Axe
description: Frail. Savage: Once per attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. This effect does not apply to impervious hit locations.

name: Bone Club
description: Cumbersome: Spend Movement as an additional cost to activate this weapon. Ignore Cumbersome if this weapon is activated indirectly (Pounce, Charge, etc).

name: Bone Blade
description: Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Dagger
description: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival. Perfect hit: An attack roll result of a lantern 10.

name: Bone Sickle
description: After the Hunt phase setup, place the Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Round Leather Shield
description: Add 1 (shield) to all  hit locations. Block 1: Spend (lightning) to ignore 1 hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

name: Hunter Whip
description: (puzzle blue)(puzzle blue) On a Perfect hit, discard 1 mood in play.

name: Rawhide Whip
description: Provoke: When you wound with this weapon, gain the priority target token.

name: Claw Head Arrow
description: Slow, Ammo - Bow: You must have a bow in your gear grid to activate this. If you hit, monster gains -1 evasion token. Use once per showdown.

name: Cat Gut Bow
description: Range: 6. Cumbersome: Spend (horse) as an additional cost of activating this weapon.

name: Cat Fang Knife
description: (square red)(square red)(square red) On a Perfect hit, gain +1 strength token. When knocked down, remove all your +1 strength tokens.

name: Lion Beast Katar
description: Deadly: +1 luck with this weapon. Paired: When you attack, add the speed of a second Lion Beast Katar in your gear grid.

name: King Spear
description: Reach 2: May attack from 2 space away.
